name: Disable embedded view actions
author: Fiberflow <fiberflow.io@gmail.com> (https://fiberflow.io)
description: Disable embedded view actions like create, sort and filter.

hideSearch.label: Hide search
hideSearch.tooltip: Hide the search input in the embedded view.

hideItems.label: Hide items
hideItems.tooltip: Hide the items in the embedded view.

hideFields.label: Hide fields
hideFields.tooltip: Hide the fields in the embedded view.

hideFilters.label: Hide filters
hideFilters.tooltip: Hide the filters in the embedded view.

hideSort.label: Hide sort
hideSort.tooltip: Hide the sort in the embedded view.

hideColors.label: Hide colors
hideColors.tooltip: Hide the colors in the embedded view.

hideCreate.label: Hide create
hideCreate.tooltip: Hide the create in the embedded view.

hideExpand.label: Hide expand
hideExpand.tooltip: Hide the expand in the embedded view.
